```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
SABCNews_tweets <- read.csv("data/SABCNews_tweets.csv")
```
```{r}
SABCNews_tweets[grepl("covid", SABCNews_tweets[["text"]]) | 
                  grepl("Covid", SABCNews_tweets[["text"]]) |
                  grepl("corona", SABCNews_tweets[["text"]]) |
                  grepl("Corona", SABCNews_tweets[["text"]]) |
                  grepl("Pandemic", SABCNews_tweets[["text"]]) |
                  grepl("pandemic", SABCNews_tweets[["text"]]), ]
```
